trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o site do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associated with the Control, if any.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associado ao controle, se houver.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects to a container; <see langword="false" /> to remove them.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para adicionar os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> a um contêiner, <see langword="false" /> para removê-los.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects from the container that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona ou remove os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> do contêiner que está associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects for the grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> para a grade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> that represents the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> que representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property to create customized views of each table displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> recuperados por meio do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> propriedade para criar exibições personalizadas de cada tabela exibida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: By default, the collection returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a coleção retornada por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> propriedade não contém nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objetos.

trans-unit.source: To create a set of customized views:
trans-unit.target: Para criar um conjunto de exibições personalizadas:

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Criará um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the grid table object to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> do objeto de tabela de grade para o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> do <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects, one for each grid column you want to show, to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos, um para cada coluna da grade para mostrar como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> de um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object to the collection returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objeto à coleção retornada pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre criar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos e adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> antes de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adiciona um vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> com uma validade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> valor à coleção, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos são gerados automaticamente para você.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, uma exceção será lançada se você tentar adicionar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos com duplicata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> found in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> para cada <xref:System.Data.DataTable> encontrado em uma <xref:System.Data.DataSet>e define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> para o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> do <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is then added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example also prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também imprime o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.target: O texto associado a esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TextChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A> propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TextChanged> evento para detectar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to deselect.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha a ter a seleção cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Unselects a specified row.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a seleção de uma linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> methods to manipulate the selection state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> métodos para manipular o estado de seleção de uma linha específica.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de rolagem vertical do controle.

trans-unit.source: The vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> da grade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visible columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de colunas visíveis.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas visíveis no visor.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: O visor é a área retangular por meio da qual a grade está visível.

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do visor depende do tamanho do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />; se você permitir que os usuários redimensionem o controle, o visor também será afetado.

trans-unit.source: The number of visible columns can change depending on their width.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas visíveis pode mudar dependendo de sua largura.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a default width for all columns is set, but the width of a new column is set twice as large, the number of visible columns can be reduced by at least one.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma largura padrão para todas as colunas é definida, mas a largura de uma nova coluna é definida duas vezes como grande, o número de colunas visíveis pode ser reduzido por ao menos um.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of visible columns.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir retorna o número de colunas visíveis.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linhas visíveis.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas visíveis no visor.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: O visor é a área retangular por meio da qual a grade está visível.

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do visor depende do tamanho do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />; se você permitir que os usuários redimensionem o controle, o visor também será afetado.

trans-unit.source: The number of visible rows can be changed at run time if the user is allowed to resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas visíveis pode ser alterado em tempo de execução se o usuário tem permissão para redimensionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of rows visible in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir retorna o número de linhas visíveis em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.
